duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform site management and monitoring activities associated with clinical studies across various phases.
Develop and update study-related trackers and monitoring tools as requested.
Assist in the assessment of CRAs and provide support to Clinical Operations.
Co-monitor with other CRAs and assist in assessing CRA performance.
Provide additional support to Clinical Operations staff and participate in department initiatives.
Review and ensure adherence to ICH GCP, local regulatory requirements, and protocol procedures.
Establish and maintain a good working relationship with site staff and assist with timely data entry and query resolution.
Assist in updating study metrics, compiling status reports, and training of CRAs.
Participate in study team meetings, and lead CRA meetings if required.
Provide additional training to site staff and assist in vendor issues as they arise.
Liaise with Data Management during all stages of a study to assist with query resolution as required.
Verify investigator maintenance of study documentation, source documentation, drug accountability, and safety reporting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in science, medical health, or related discipline or equivalent relevant experience
